name: Create nested entities in data factory

properties.label: X-Access-Token
properties.description:
Access token of the user
(${initiator().accessToken or completer('taskDefinitionId').accessToken})

properties.label: X-Digital-Signature source
properties.description:
Ceph key of the document containing X-Digital-Signature
(${sign_submission('signTaskDefinitionId').signatureDocumentId})

properties.label: X-Digital-Signature-Derived source
properties.description:
Ceph key of document that contains X-Digital-Signature-Derived
(${execution.getVariable("secure-sys-var-ref-task-form-data-{taskDefinitionId}")})

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: The process variable to put response to (transient)
